chart_description: This chart displays the number of database operations performed per second in Active Directory (AD). It shows the rate of add, delete, modify, and recycle operations on the AD database.

dimension_descriptions.add: The number of add operations performed per second on the AD database.
dimension_descriptions.delete: The number of delete operations performed per second on the AD database.
dimension_descriptions.modify: The number of modify operations performed per second on the AD database.
dimension_descriptions.recycle: The number of recycle operations performed per second on the AD database. This dimension represents the number of objects that were deleted and then restored from the AD recycle bin.
